name: Collective[i]
overview: Collective[i] is a Software-as-a-Service technology designed to manage large sets of business and marketing data and to provide business leaders with decision-support. Collective[i] answers business questions without the technical challenges of analytics, managing everything from storage to integration on its backend. Analytical applications are readily available to answer business and marketing questions, so companies can begin using Collective[i] immediately. Unique collaboration tools and applications are integrated into the analyses, which enables businesses to efficiently make use of the knowledge derived from their people and their data. With the knowledge created through Collective[i], marketers are unencumbered by the time-consuming tasks of managing media distribution and execution and can focus instead on developing strategies and messaging to respond to and reach their target audience.
